$comment: Specimen Part Version 0.4.0, only if the part did not get a separate catalogue number, otherwise it will be a separate digital specimen itself
title: Specimen Part

@id.description: The identifier for the Specimen Part object.

@type.description: The type of the digital object, in this case a ods:SpecimenPart

dwc:materialEntityID.description: An identifier for a particular instance of a ods:SpecimenPart. Note that if this is a registration number the suggested approach is to create a separate Digital Specimen for the entity

dwc:recordNumber.description: An identifier given to a ods:SpecimenPart at the time it was recorded. Often serves as a link between field notes and a ods:MaterialEntity record, such as a specimen collector's number

dwc:preparations.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of preparations and preservation methods for a ods:SpecimenPart

ods:isMarkedAsType.description: The material entity is marked as a type specimen

ods:topicOrigin.description: Highest-level terms identifying the fundamentals of the activities, in which context the objects in the collection were collected

ods:topicDomain.description: High-level terms providing general domain information with which the objects are associated

ods:topicDiscipline.description: Overarching classification of the scientific discipline to which the objects within the collection belong or are related

ods:topicCategory.description: Countable things (objects) served as a more detailed classification of each of the disciplines

ods:specimenName.description: The accepted specimen name of the digital specimen

dwc:organismID.description: An identifier for the organism instance. May be a globally unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set

dwc:organismName.description: A textual name or label assigned to an organism instance

dwc:organismScope.description: A description of the kind of organism instance. Can be used to indicate whether the organism instance represents a discrete organism or if it represents a particular type of aggregation

dwc:organismRemarks.description: Comments or notes about the organism
examples: One of a litter of six
Organism has been split up into multiple specimen, some of which are in different institutions

dwc:organismQuantity.description: A number or enumeration value for the quantity of organisms

dwc:organismQuantityType.description: A dwc:organismQuantityType must have a corresponding dwc:organismQuantity

ods:hasIdentifications.description: Contains the identifications made for the specimen part

ods:hasAssertions.description: Contains assertions that are specific to the specimen part, such as measurements

ods:hasIdentifiers.description: Contains identifiers that are specific to the specimen part

ods:hasEvents.description: Contains information about any events that occurred specifically on the specimen part, for example a sampling event

ods:hasAgents.description: Contains agents that are specifically connect to the specimen part

ods:hasChronometricAges.description: Contains information about the chronometric age of the specimen part
